context: Regulation for maintaining safe distances between vehicles on an expressway, dependent on vehicle speed.

MTL_expressions.description: Vehicle exceeds 100 km/h must maintain a distance of at least 100 meters from the vehicle in front in the same lane.

MTL_fitness_details.explanation: MTL is suitable for formalizing time-bound speed and distance conditions.
MTL_fitness_details.alternative_methods: Other logical formalisms or rule-based systems.

propositions.ambiguities: Measurement method for speed not specified.

propositions.description: Distance to the vehicle in front is at least 100 meters
propositions.ambiguities: Method of distance measurement not specified.

MTL_expressions.description: When speed is lower than 100 km/h, distance to vehicle in front can be reduced but not less than 50 meters.

MTL_fitness_details.explanation: MTL appropriate for formalizing variable speed and distance constraints.

propositions.description: Vehicle speed is lower than 100 km/h
propositions.ambiguities: Method of speed measurement not clear.

propositions.description: Distance to the vehicle in front is not less than 50 meters
propositions.ambiguities: Method of distance measurement not specified.

non_formalized_parts.description: Time bounds for speed measurement and method for measuring distance are not specified.
non_formalized_parts.reason_for_non_formalization: Lack of specific details in the text.

sequence_dependencies.dependency_description: The second condition is relevant when the first is not met.
